Docs.summary: Thrown when SQL Server or the ADO.NET provider detects an invalid user-defined type (UDT).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo si, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo si, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.summary: Streams all the properties into the class for the given <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is present in the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.InvalidUdtException> class to make the class serializable.
